program.name: XML-SAX-Writer
program.uninstall:
_installsitearch=$(${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -e \ 'use Config; print $Config{"installsitearch"} . "\n";')
cat ${_installsitearch}/auto/XML/SAX/Writer/.packlist |\ while read _file; do rm ${_file}
_dir=$(dirname ${_file}) test -d ${_dir} && rmdir ${_dir} 2>/dev/null done
rm ${_installsitearch}/auto/XML/SAX/Writer/.packlist rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/XML/SAX/Writer rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/XML/SAX 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/XML 2>/dev/null
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ /head2.*L<XML::SAX::Writer|/,/back/ { g N d }" ${_installsitearch}/perllocal.pod
